topic.title: ZeroMe: content.json - files_allowed
topic.body:
Hello, the ZeroMe hub file data/users/content.json contains "user_contents" section which has "permission_rules" sub-section that contains:

    "files_allowed": "(data.json|avatar.jpg|avatar.png)",

some hub use extended line:

    "files_allowed": "(data.json|avatar.jpg|webm|mp4|gif|zip|7z|avatar.png|msgpack)",

I am wondering **what is the purpose of this line** and **if second line is meaningful/correct** (maybe "mp4" should be ".mp4" or *.mp4 or other way to prevent lets say malicious.mp4.js ?

Main section of the data/users/content.json also contains:

 "optional": ".*\\.(png|jpg|gif|zip|7z|txt|mp4|webm|msgpack)",

which seems similar to files_allowed. How these two differ? Knowledgebase not explain this.

topic.title: Idea on a new site: create galleries/playlists out of other zites multimedia files
topic.body:
Hello, i am not a developer and here is an idea **what kind of zite i am missing there**.
The **zite that would allow users to create collections of favorite zeronet hosted multimedia**

For example i create playlist called Favorite pop music and there will be text area where i can input zeronet URLs to a mp4, mp3 files and submit them (unsure if the site can search all my optional files and use it to to import such URLs). Then i can easily play and loop this whole playlist. The site would ask me to Grant permission to external sites to get requested files - same as for example [ZeroBlog++](19fZJhX7FGENeRRLB8ftgrziBJ5vsLtFog) does it for externaly linked images (for example). (i do not like how zeronet handle cross-site linking, similar [github issue](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/issues/1992))

Also the site can allow me to create image galleries where images are linked from external zites. I can then share the link to my playlists/galleries with other zeronet users and  they can bookmark it on the site so they can also in the future quickly access it.

Users can easily rename and move their favorite galleries/playlists into subcategories.

Site may support search to quickly get into matching named gallery or the particular multimedia file.

1516747912_1AnFGL613gYqFWm4Lhwdk6x5gCRe1.body:
Hi, this is what i am missing so far:

=> search function like one at [ZeroTorrent](http://127.0.0.1:43110/ZeroTorrent.bit/), only smaller search field under some button or icon maybe
=> auto increase users limit of published content (USED: x/20K) by lets say 1K every day to prevent reaching limit on admin abandoned sites in future
=> [downvotes](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroTalk/issues/9) / flag as a spam option. Topics flagged Too many times will disappear from public until site admin/moderators will put them back or delete permanently. such topic can no longer be put for moderation unless author will modify it.

> currently a user can create an unlimited amount of id's

i see. But if the vote system can be abused, i think same apply on standard commenting system which can be abused for spam or make site unusable by spam flood from many ids created from one machine. In that case some antibot/user reputation system may be needed: https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/issues/1310

1516747933_1AnFGL613gYqFWm4Lhwdk6x5gCRe1.body: Search field/button, possibly supporting operators like: +mustcontain -mustnotcontain +"exact phrase" somephrase

Allow importing data from any MySQL database into ZeroBlog, [here it is described](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GitLiXB6t5r8vuU2zC6a8GYj9ME6HMQ4t/repo/issues/view/?1M5dciFFSWt4wKs9Nnxa34BgGnt7os7h3v/1@1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS)

thx binchan2

Anyway here is another thing i am missing. Button to follow certain blog post comments. Do not know if it is wise, but i do not see as a reliable option to follow only mentions because some user do not use mentions to reply. And following all posts comments is too broad.

1516741810_1AnFGL613gYqFWm4Lhwdk6x5gCRe1.body: Most popular sites are Youtube, Facebook, Twitter. Maybe combining these together so it has [ZeroMe](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/) kind of tweeting. People can form closed groups. People can instant chat like at [Thunderwave](http://127.0.0.1:43110/thunderwave.bit) personally each with other or in groups they created. They can personal message each other and see notifications if new message arrive. Another function would be image posting, maybe add instagram/pinterest/reddit like functions. And they can also share videos. So entirely some portal that combines the functions that are most popular on the internet. So people want to stay there and interact.

1516748111_1AnFGL613gYqFWm4Lhwdk6x5gCRe1.body:
- Users can send an invitation to follow each other and followed users can send each other a personal messages
- Users participating in certain group can send message that will appear only to all people of this group. Group can be closed group, invitation/request only.
- [User can show only certain language posts](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroMe/issues/113) (example his/her primary language and english)
